title: Why does everyone in the World hate Season 6?

replies.body: Because it's new and people hate change.
Nah its literally Marksman meta right now, this is worse than the tank, juggernaut and assassin metas combined, ADCs one shot you and you cant do anything about it.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PO7W4Ix5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-11T23:08:27.879+0000)
>
> Nah its literally Marksman meta right now, this is worse than the tank, juggernaut and assassin metas combined, ADCs one shot you and you cant do anything about it.

I haven't been able to play yet but I'd assume the way to win is to one-shot them before they touch you.
True but with he new masteries when you "one shot them" they will put 1 shot on you and get all there hp back -_-
It might have just been my imagination but i thought they added an item that turns "one-shot" damage into DoT

An item designed for ADCs, that turns "1-shot" into "2-shot" and that the person you're trying to fight might decide to build as well so it turns into a race for "2-shot" instead of "1-shot". Not to mention the difficulty of actually gaining the gold needed to build the item, especially when being consistently "1-shot" by the other team.

How can the game be balanced if everyone **must** have a specific item in order to survive for less than a second longer or to even have a chance at not dying?
If you're seriously having this much trouble against the adc's then play an assassin or a tank, learn how to counter pick, counter build and counter play. Ez

> Because it's new and people hate change.

Very Funny. I'm sure by the start of the season all those people ranting on about how broken and unbalanced the changes are will be loving the new changes and maining the reworked ADCS. COMMMUNITY PLS
I agree to an extent but i was pretty bummed about the mastery reset.
But it's the "pre-season", a lot of time to fix all the stuff. Some idiots just like to complain a lot.
I actually love this patch, aside from the big fuck you to ap champs but ill take it on the chin :/

Its just the preseason. They've only just put it out. The next couple of patches will be all about tuning it up, but this update was basically saying "Hey players, this is the direction we are going in." They'll balance everything in the end, but right now, its basically just chucking out the big gameplay changes so we can get used to it.
because it is the worst season so far. simple as that.

Personally I don't exactly like the new changes but obviously, it's new and it takes time. What I think they shouldn't of done was not even warn us about the masteries being reset completely. I went into my first game not knowing my masteries were changed.

Something else they shouldn't of done was remove mana potions. So many champions require mana potions to sustain and without them, it's quite difficult. If I recall correctly, Crystalline Flask was also removed? If it wasn't, fair enough, but seriously, at least make the Mana Potions 50 gold because it's a vital part for some champions when they start.
